actor_awards.notes: Best known for his comedic roles as a thick-accented Italian or French gigolo in two classic Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers musicals, 'The Gay Divorcee' and 'Top Hat'. He originated these roles on Broadway before bringing them to the screen.

filmography.title: Top Hat
filmography.role_description: A flamboyant Italian fashion designer who is briefly married to the female lead due to a misunderstanding.
filmography.plot: An American dancer comes to London and falls for a model who mistakes him for his goofy producer.

filmography.title: The Gay Divorcee
filmography.role_description: A passionate, phrase-mangling professional co-respondent hired to stage an adulterous scene.
filmography.plot: A woman thinks a flirting man is the co-respondent her lawyer has hired to expedite her divorce.

filmography.title: Charlie Chan in Paris
filmography.role_description: A French artist who becomes a suspect in a murder investigation involving bank forgeries.
filmography.plot: Charlie Chan is sent to Paris to investigate bond forgeries but finds a murder.

filmography.title: One Rainy Afternoon
filmography.role_description: A haughty count who is a rival suitor for the affections of the female lead.
filmography.plot: A struggling actor accidentally kisses the wrong girl in a movie theater, causing a scandal that surprisingly launches his career.

filmography.title: Music for Madame
filmography.role_description: A comedic character involved in the musical aspirations of a young tenor.
filmography.plot: An aspiring singer gets mixed up with jewel thieves in an attempt to get his voice heard in Hollywood.

filmography.title: On Your Toes
filmography.role_description: A jealous Russian ballet dancer who clashes with a vaudeville performer entering the world of ballet.
filmography.plot: A vaudeville dancer turned music teacher gets involved with a Russian ballet company and becomes the target of a jealous principal dancer.

filmography.title: The Nitwits
filmography.role_description: A songwriter who helps two cigar counter clerks solve a murder mystery.
filmography.plot: Two bumbling cigar counter clerks try to clear a girl's name when she is accused of murdering a music publisher.

filmography.title: Mysterious Mr. Moto
filmography.role_description: A member of the League of Assassins whom Mr. Moto investigates.
filmography.plot: Mr. Moto poses as a criminal to infiltrate a league of assassins and stop their next target from being killed.

filmography.title: The Smartest Girl in Town
filmography.role_description: A wealthy baron whom a model intends to marry for money, complicated by her love for another man.
filmography.plot: A model tries to snag a rich husband but mistakenly falls for a photographer she believes is poor.

filmography.title: A Night at the Ritz
filmography.role_description: A temperamental chef at the Ritz Hotel whose culinary skills are central to the plot.
filmography.plot: A marketing man promotes a chef at a fancy hotel, only to discover the chef can't actually cook.

filmography.title: Woman Chases Man
filmography.role_description: An architect involved in a scheme to fund a real estate development.
filmography.plot: A female architect tries to charm a wealthy man into funding her project, dealing with his eccentric father along the way.

filmography.title: Old Man Rhythm
filmography.role_description: A college student who interacts with a businessman enrolling as a freshman.
filmography.plot: A businessman enrolls in college to keep an eye on his son and gets involved in campus life and romance.

filmography.title: Special Investigator
filmography.role_description: A racketeer who becomes a target of a lawyer turned G-Man.
filmography.plot: A criminal lawyer leaves his practice to join the Justice Department and hunt down the mobster who killed his brother.

filmography.title: Criminal Lawyer
filmography.role_description: A bandleader involved in the legal drama surrounding a lawyer rising to District Attorney.
filmography.plot: A brilliant defense attorney uses unscrupulous tactics to win cases and eventually runs for District Attorney.

filmography.title: The Lady in the Morgue
filmography.role_description: A society man who becomes a suspect when a body disappears from the morgue.
filmography.plot: A private detective tries to solve the mystery of a woman's body that is stolen from the morgue before she can be identified.

filmography.title: Chatterbox
filmography.role_description: A stage producer who becomes the target of a country girl's acting ambitions.
filmography.plot: A country girl obsessed with the stage travels to the city to become an actress, hiding in a production of 'Romeo and Juliet'.

filmography.title: Dramatic School
filmography.role_description: A charming man in the social circle of aspiring actresses in Paris.
filmography.plot: A poor factory worker attends drama school at night and dreams of becoming a star while spinning tall tales about her life.

filmography.title: Fight for Your Lady
filmography.role_description: A wrestling promoter in Europe who helps an American singer.
filmography.plot: An American concert singer in London is unlucky in love and gets involved with a wrestling trainer to regain his confidence.

filmography.title: Beg, Borrow or Steal
filmography.role_description: A crooked art dealer operating in France.
filmography.plot: Three Americans living in France try to impress their visiting relatives by pretending to be successful.

filmography.title: Meet the Girls
filmography.role_description: A stowaway and blackmailer who complicates the lives of two entertainers.
filmography.plot: Two entertainers lose their jobs and money in Honolulu and get mixed up with a jewel thief on a ship back to San Francisco.

filmography.title: Say It in French
filmography.role_description: A comedic reporter character.
filmography.plot: A golfer marries a French girl to save her from deportation but must keep the marriage secret from his family and fiancée.

filmography.title: Two in the Dark
filmography.role_description: A suspicious character in a murder mystery involving an amnesiac.
filmography.plot: A man suffering from amnesia finds himself at a murder scene and teams up with an unemployed actress to clear his name.

filmography.title: Second Wife
filmography.role_description: A friend of the couple navigating a second marriage.
filmography.plot: A drama exploring the complications of a second marriage involving children from previous relationships.

filmography.title: Won Ton Ton: The Dog Who Saved Hollywood
filmography.role_description: A small role in this comedy about 1920s Hollywood, marking Rhodes' return to film after decades.
filmography.plot: A dog becomes a major movie star in the 1920s, but his human friends struggle with the studio system.
